channel.title: LibriVox Audiobooks
channel.description: LibriVox harnesses the power of the many to record audio versions of books in the public domain. This feed links to our current chapter-by-chapter book podcast and the last few books we've podcast. Visit our catalog at http://librivox.org/newcatalog/ for more books!
channel.copyright: All librivox recordings are in the public domain. Enjoy!
channel.itunes:subtitle: Free, public domain audio books, recorded by volunteers
channel.itunes:summary: LibriVox is a hope, an experiment, and a question: can the net harness a bunch of volunteers to help bring books in the public domain to life? LibriVox wants all books in the public domain to be available, for free, in audio format, on the internet. We are a totally volunteer, open source, free content, public domain project. We get most of our texts from Project Gutenberg. The Internet Archive hosts our audio files. Send comments and questions to info@librivox.org and visit our catalog at http://librivox.org/newcatalog/
channel.itunes:keywords: librivox, literature, volunteer, books, audio, book, audiobook, free, public, domain, spoken, word, read
channel.itunes:author: Librivox Volunteers
